mapper.insert: insert into goods (id, code, name_zh, name_en, status, create_time, update_time, memo) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameZh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update goods set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_zh = #{nameZh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_en = #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, code, name_zh, name_en, status, create_time, update_time, memo from goods
